issue.title: [Release][C++] Windows source verification should not mutate source tree
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16322](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16322). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`verify-release-candidate.bat` creates a temporary dir for verification, but for some reason it still creates its CMake build dir inside the Arrow source tree. It should instead create the CMake build dir inside the temporary verification dir.
